translations.greetings: Thank you for signing up to our platform.
translations.verifyinfos: Please verify your email by clicking on the following button.
translations.unrequestedregister: If you don't remember signing up to Graasp, you can just ignore this email.
translations.magiclink: You asked us to send you a magic link for quickly signing in to your account. Here your go:
translations.unrequestedlink: If you haven't requested the link, no further action is required. It will expire soon, don't worry you account and data are safe.
